title: Nutriota Vitamin B3 (Nicotinamide) | 54 mg (180 Capsules)
aboutContent: HIGH CONCENTRATION VITAMIN B3 NICOTINAMIDE 54 MG PER CAPSULE - Each vegan capsule contains 54mg of nicotinamide, a form of niacin that does not cause redness. Each bottle contains 180 capsules. WHY NICOTINAMIDE? Thanks to our nicotinamide supplement, you can benefit from all the advantages of vitamin B3 without the side effect of "niacin flush".
descriptionContent: Vitamin B3, belonging to the B vitamin group, is an essential nutrient for human health found in foods like liver, chicken breast, tuna, avocado, mushrooms, and peas. Our supplement offers the benefits of vitamin B3 in easy-to-swallow capsules, suitable for vegans and vegetarians. A supplement you can trust: formulated in vegetable cellulose capsules, free from synthetic excipients, GMOs, and gluten.
generalInfoContent:
• Package Dimensions: 11.2 x 5.8 x 5.7 cm; 130 g
• Units: 180.0 Count
